name: Atuin
description: Atuin replaces your existing shell history with a SQLite database, and records additional context for your commands. Additionally, it provides optional and fully encrypted shell history sync across machines.

notes.text: After installation, you'll need to register users with 'atuin register <username>' from client machines.
For client setup, add 'export ATUIN_HOST="http://<server-ip>:8888"' to your shell config.
